title: Doctor Privacé & The Secret of Personal Data

nodes.speaker: Doctor Privacé
nodes.text: Bonjour, my friend! I'm Doctor Privacé, keeper of secrets. The Hacker Lord is hoarding people’s private info to build a giant ad-making robot. Do you know what counts as personal data?

nodes.speaker: Doctor Privacé
nodes.text: Très bien! Quick quiz: Which of these is personal info?

nodes.speaker: Hacker Lord
nodes.text: Muahaha! Pepperoni tells me nothing. But your ID? That’s priceless. You need a lesson!

nodes.speaker: Doctor Privacé
nodes.text: Exactly! Info that points to you is private. Nicely done, superstar!

nodes.speaker: Doctor Privacé
nodes.text: Personal data means info that identifies you: name, phone, email, address, ID, birthday. Even your pet’s name—if you use it as a password!

nodes.speaker: Doctor Privacé
nodes.text: So, how does the sneaky Hacker Lord steal your data?

nodes.speaker: Doctor Privacé
nodes.text: Yes! Some surveys ask for way too much. 'What is your mother's maiden name?' Pardon? Non merci!

nodes.speaker: Doctor Privacé
nodes.text: Oui! Oversharing online helps attackers guess passwords or security answers. Maybe don’t post your address AND your travel plan…

nodes.speaker: Doctor Privacé
nodes.text: Correct! Public Wi-Fi is like a suspicious free buffet—you never know who’s watching you snack!

nodes.speaker: Doctor Privacé
nodes.text: Now let’s learn how to protect your precious data. What do you want to know?

options.text: How to talk to apps asking for permissions

nodes.speaker: Doctor Privacé
nodes.text: Do NOT share ID numbers, address, phone, travel plans, or bank info. Also, don’t post your pet’s name if it’s your password. Bad combo!

nodes.speaker: Doctor Privacé
nodes.text: Use websites with HTTPS, use a VPN on public Wi-Fi, and avoid sketchy sites promising free movies plus magic prizes.

nodes.speaker: Doctor Privacé
nodes.text: Apps often ask for extra permissions. A wallpaper app wanting your GPS? Suspicious! Say NON!

nodes.speaker: Doctor Privacé
nodes.text: Scenario: A shopping site asks for your ID number and home address before checkout. What do you do?

options.text: Only provide necessary info and verify the site

nodes.speaker: Hacker Lord
nodes.text: Delicious! Now I have your info. Next I’ll spam you with fake discount emails! Muahaha!

nodes.speaker: Doctor Privacé
nodes.text: Très bon! Always check what data is really needed and make sure the website is real before sharing anything.

nodes.speaker: Doctor Privacé
nodes.text: Final test! What’s the BEST way to keep private data safe?

nodes.speaker: Doctor Privacé
nodes.text: Under the pillow?! What if the Hacker Lord is pretending to be the tooth fairy?!

nodes.speaker: Doctor Privacé
nodes.text: Correct! Be careful, share only what’s needed, and guard it well. You’re now a Privacy Champion!

nodes.speaker: Doctor Privacé
nodes.text: Story <Doctor Privacé & The Secret of Personal Data> complete! Keep protecting your secrets, mon ami!
